'''Allison''' is a woman who was caught in a fire with her baby.

==History==
Allison was at Crossroads Strip Mall when it caught fire. She ended up trapped on a balcony with her baby, Jacob. With the building no longer sound, Jack used the ladder to reach Allison, but in the meantime, Ryan had Allison toss her baby, Jacob, down to him so he'd be safe. Then Jack got the ladder close enough that Allison was able to jump to safety.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
She has a son named Jacob whom she had to drop down to [[Ryan Tanner]] when she was caught in a fire.
